thread.title: First London visit
thread.title_full: First London visit - Review of Holiday Inn Express Earls Court, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Threetravellers08
title: First London visit
text: This Hotel is not in a convienient location a long way to walk with luggage .at least 25 minutes .if you use West Kensington you have 30 steps to go up and a 20 minute walk.The room is ok we are in the building across the lane. Breakfast is a total disaster. Dirty tables and dishes everywhere. One person working not able to keep up. There was never enough food This Needs improvement ! Can't say that I would come back or stay here again.
